welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.desc: The original idea consisted on building a clothes online shop called LionMiss. However, the project. As the project had been continuing for a lon time, it never ended. So I decied to deploy Swagger, GraphQL editor and Storybook to show some elements from the back and front. It also published all repository related to the project.
